title: Juvenile Delinquency Forms (Family Court Act Article 3)
content:
Juvenile Delinquency Forms (Family Court Act Article 3)

State Regulations

Form 3-1 - Juvenile delinquency-order on motion for change of venue

Form 3-2 - Juvenile delinquency-order for change of venue

Form 3-3 - Appearance ticket

Form 3-4 - Application-pre-petition detention

Form 3-5 - Juvenile delinquency-order directing release from detention

Form 3-6 - Juvenile delinquency-order directing pre-petition detention

Form 3-7 - Petition

Form 3-8 - Designated Felony Act petition

Form 3-9 - Juvenile delinquency-adjournment in contemplation of dismissal

Form 3-10 - Application to restore to calendar

Form 3-11 - Juvenile delinquency-order directing detention

Form 3-11a - Juvenile delinquency-order directing release of respondent with conditions

Form 3-12 - Juvenile delinquency-order of referral to probation-post-petition

Form 3-13 - Juvenile delinquency-order release of dismisal after adjustment

Form 3-14 - Juvenile delinquency-order directing examination to determine capacity

Form 3-15 - Notice of hearing

Form 3-16 - Juvenile delinquency-order extending time for examination to determine capacity

Form 3-17 - Examination report (to determine capacity)

Form 3-18 - Juvenile delinquency-order proceeding to determine capacity

Form 3-19 - Juvenile delinquency-incapacitated person-after probably cause hearing

Form 3-20 - Petition (to extend period of commitment)

Form 3-21 - Juvenile delinquency-extension of commitment for lack of capacity

Form 3-22 - Petition (dismissal for continuing lack of capacity)

Form 3-23 - Juvenile delinquency-order dismissing petition for lack of capacity

Form 3-24 - Petition (modification of order of commitment)

Form 3-25 - Juvenile delinquency-order modifying order of commitment for lack of capacity

Form 3-26 - Petition (to determine capacity after prior commitment)

Form 3-27 - Juvenile delinquency-order determining capacity

Form 3-28 - Juvenile delinquency-order upon fact-fining

Form 3-29 - Juvenile delinquency-order of disposition

Form 3-30 - Juvenile delinquency-order of disposition after order of removal

Form 3-31 - Juvenile delinquency-order of disposition

Form 3-32 - Juvenile delinquency-order of disposition designated felony-after order of removal with finding-no restrictive placement

Form 3-33 - Juvenile delinquency-order of disposition-designated felony-restrictive placement

Form 3-34 - Juvenile delinquency-order of disposition after removal-restrictive placement

Form 3-35 - Transfer to Department of Mental Hygiene: additional provisions

Form 3-36 - Provisions for use where section 353.6 Family Court Act applies (restitution and services for the public good)

Form 3-37 - Notice of disposition or termination of proceeding

Form 3-38 - Juvenile delinquency-petition for extension of placement and permanency hearing

Form 3-39 - Juvenile delinquency-extension of placement and permanency hearing order

Form 3-40 - Petition for violation of order of probation or conditional discharge

Form 3-41 - Juvenile delinquency-order of violation of probation or conditional discharge

Form 3-42 - Order (sealing of official records)

Form 3-43 - Notice of motion

Form 3-44 - Juvenile delinquency-order on motion

Form 3-45 - Order of dismissal

Form 3-46 - Order for HIV-related testing

Form 3-47 - Notice of placement

Form 3-48 - Close to home - order on petition to modify placement

Form 3-49 - Close to Home - order on petition to transfer placement to NYS OCFS
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
